[Your professional story here...] *Started my journey in data analytics when...* *Currently focused on...* *Passionate about...* ## Skills & Expertise ### Technical Skills - **Programming**: Python, R - **Database**: MySQL, PostgreSQL - **Data Visualization**: Tableau, Power BI, Excel, Datorama - **Machine Learning**: Scikit-learn, Predictive Modeling, Regression algorithms, Forecasting models, Classification algorithms and Forecasting models - **Cloud systems**: Git, AWS, Spark (SparkSQL, PySpark) - **Statistics**: Hypothesis testing, Chi-square test, T-tests, probability distributions - **Marketing Analytics**: GA4 (Google Analytics), A/B testing, Media Mix Modeling (MMM), Market Research, Audience segmentation, Google Tag Manager (GTM), paid media strategy, Marketing measurement frameworks. ### Domain Expertise - Marketing Analytics - Healthcare Analytics - Business Intelligence - Data Storytelling ## Education & Certifications - **Bachelor of Science in Data Science** - University Name (Year) - **Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate** - Google (Year) - **AWS Cloud Practitioner** - Amazon Web Services (Year) ## Currently Learning - Advanced Regression algorithms for Marketing Analytics - Core basics of Marketing Mix Modeling - Attribution and Incrementality testing & how to built these measurmenet frameworks for Marketing Analytics --- *"Your favorite data-related quote or personal philosophy"*
